channel.title: Comments on: Bright, Shiny, New
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Jen Gheller
item.dc:creator: Jen Gheller
item.description: This is just what I needed to read right now. I get so many ideas all at once and then end up working on none because I can't focus on which I want to work on. I'll try jotting them all down quickly and then picking one and see how that works out!
item.content:encoded: This is just what I needed to read right now. I get so many ideas all at once and then end up working on none because I can’t focus on which I want to work on. I’ll try jotting them all down quickly and then picking one and see how that works out!
